courses.title: Piano Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the piano, including reading sheet music, finger techniques, and music theory.

courses.title: Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Master the guitar with advanced techniques, chord progressions, and improvisation skills.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Learn the essentials of drumming, including rhythm patterns, drum fills, and proper drumming posture.

courses.title: Singing Techniques
courses.description: Discover various singing techniques including breath control, vocal range, and performance skills.

courses.title: Bass Guitar Basics
courses.description: Get started with the bass guitar, covering basic techniques, scales, and popular basslines.

courses.title: Music Production Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music production, including recording, mixing, and mastering.

courses.title: Violin Mastery
courses.description: Master the violin with advanced bowing techniques, vibrato, and classical repertoire.
